snippet: After a day of intense lobbying, the Palestinians persuaded Arab diplomats to support a draft Security Council resolution that is aimed at the full withdrawal of Israeli forces from the West Bank.
abstract: Palestinians at United Nations persuade fellow Arab diplomats to support draft Security Council resolution that sets one-year deadline for negotiations with Israel and is aimed at full withdrawal of Israeli forces from West Bank; resolution's strict deadlines make its passage unlikely, though Palestinian diplomats say that language could be changed to address concerns of Security Council members.
lead_paragraph: After a day of intense lobbying, the Palestinians persuaded Arab diplomats to support a draft Security Council resolution that is aimed at the full withdrawal of Israeli forces from the West Bank.

headline.main: Palestinians Make Strides Toward Draft Resolution at U.N.
headline.print_headline: Palestinians Make Strides Toward Draft Resolution at U.N.
